actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for confidential treatment of medical peer review and quality assurance documents.
short_title: Veterans Administration Medical Quality Assurance Records Confidentiality Act

summary.text: Veterans' Administration Medical Quality Assurance Records Confidentiality Act - Provides for the confidentiality of all records and documents which are part of any Veterans' Administration medical quality assurance program. Stipulates that disclosure of such material may be made only under specified circumstances (unlawful disclosure to be punishable by fine and/or imprisonment), including: (1) congressional oversight functions; (2) Government or private licensing and accreditation functions; (3) statutory functions; and (4) public health or safety, or emergency, functions. Defines "medical quality assurance programs" for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: Veterans Administration Medical Quality Assurance Records Confidentiality Act
A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for confidential treatment of medical peer review and quality assurance documents.
